name: Hentai NetWalk
description: Hentai NetWalk is a network construction logic game, and what you need to do is to connect all the devices to the network.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
